legacy:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

legacy:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
legacy:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

legacy:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

legacy:black_heart.NAME: Black Heart
legacy:black_heart.FLAVOR: You can still hear their whispers...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by X, where X is the number of charges this has. NL Gain #b1 charge AND 1 max hp each time you defeat an elite or a boss.

legacy:everburning_torch.NAME: Everburning Torch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat #yScry X then draw 1 card, where X is the number of charges this has. NL Gain #b1 charge each time you defeat a boss.

legacy:omni_charm.NAME: Omni Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 Strength, #b1 Dexterity, and #b1 Focus.

legacy:timeless_vault.NAME: Timeless vault
legacy:timeless_vault.FLAVOR: Money money money money money motherfucker
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain X gold, where X is the number of charges this has. NL Gain 5 charge whenever you climb a floor.
